alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 11:45AM AKST until December 12 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected with low visibility. Plan on slippery road conditions. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch is expected. Expect visibilities of one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...In Passes. * WHEN...through 6 AM Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts up to 40 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Wind chill 40 below zero to 55 below zero expected. The cold wind chills will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for wet snow means periods of wet snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
